name: Tempest's Wrath Magical Items
description:
Twenty new magical items for use with the Tempest's Wrath Campaign

Have Fun Harbor Masters

results.text: Stormbringer Cutlass A silver-edged cutlass crackling with static. Effect: On a successful hit, roll a d4. On a 4, the target takes an additional d4 lightning damage.
Tempest Stone A palm-sized gemstone that hums with thunderous energy. Effect: Once per day, summon a violent storm for 1 hour. All ranged attacks are +2 DR during this time.
Rod of the Thundercaller A weathered staff tipped with a glass orb that crackles with sparks. Effect: Casts Call Lightning once per day (Presence DR12). Deals d6 damage in a 20’ radius.
Gale-Warden Cloak A cloak that flows unnaturally, as if caught in a perpetual breeze. Effect: Grants the wearer immunity to falling damage and +2 to Agility tests against forced movement.

Storm Gauntlet An iron gauntlet wrapped in coils of silver and etched with storm glyphs. Effect: Unarmed strikes deal d6 lightning damage. Once per rest, unleash a Lightning Arc (Presence DR14, d8 damage to two targets within 15').
Voltaic Compass A compass with jagged lines of energy swirling within its glass face. Effect: Points toward the nearest source of magical energy and crackles when within 100 feet.
Electrified Net A fishing net laced with glowing silver threads. Effect: When thrown (Presence DR10), entangles a target. The target takes d4 lightning damage if it tries to break free.
Sky Piercer Harpoon A harpoon with a shaft made of solidified stormcloud. Effect: On a successful hit, deal d10 lightning damage. If thrown during a storm, it returns to the wielder's hand.
Stormchaser’s Boots Boots engraved with swirling wind patterns. Effect: Wearer can dash across water for up to 30 feet. Once per day, double movement speed for 1 round.
Sparkshot Pistol A flintlock modified with a copper coil and charged crystal. Effect: Fires a bolt of lightning (Presence DR14, range 40’, d8 lightning damage). Must recharge after firing.

Thunderhead Amulet A necklace holding a swirling, miniature stormcloud. Effect: Once per day, create a deafening Thunderclap (Presence DR12). All within 20’ must pass Toughness DR10 or be deafened for d4 rounds.
Stormwarden’s Helm A helm shaped like a crashing wave, with crackling inlays. Effect: Grants immunity to paralysis and grants +2 DR against lightning-based attacks.
Chain of Tempests A golden chain adorned with storm-battered coins. Effect: Can bind a summoned spirit or creature for 1 hour. Any bound entity takes d6 lightning damage if it resists commands.
Static Blade A slender sword that hums with potential energy. Effect: On a crit, the weapon discharges a shockwave (10' radius). All creatures in range must test Agility DR12 or take d4 damage.
Boltbiter Arrows Arrows tipped with jagged pieces of storm metal. Effect: When fired (Agility DR12), bolts of lightning leap between nearby enemies (deal d6 to up to 2 nearby targets).

Heart of the Tempest A heart-shaped crystalline orb pulsing with arcs of electricity. Effect: Grants +2 to all Presence tests involving weather. Once per day, unleash a Chain Lightning spell (3 targets, d8 damage each).
Stormshroud Armor A suit of light chainmail infused with storm energy. Effect: Grants -d2 damage reduction. On a successful defense roll, attackers take d4 lightning damage.

Siren’s Call Lantern A brass lantern with a flickering, storm-blue flame. Effect: Attracts lightning strikes (Presence DR10). Anyone standing within 10 feet takes half damage from storm-related effects.

Eye of the Storm A monocle with a swirling blue lens. Effect: When worn, allows the user to see through natural and magical storms and fogs. Once per day, allows the wearer to predict the weather with perfect accuracy.

Tempest Fang A jagged dagger made from the tooth of a lightning beast. Effect: On a successful backstab, the target takes an additional d8 lightning damage and must test Toughness DR12 or be stunned for 1 round.
